column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " I have a surprise for everyone ! "
#Text=Toph says : " I knew it !
#Text=I was looking for cooking pots in the attic , and I found this !
#Text=Look at baby Zuko .
#Text=Is n't he cute ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh , lighten up .
#Text=I 'm just teasing .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's not me .
#Text=It 's my father .
#Text=" Suki says : " But he looks so sweet and innocent .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , that sweet little kid grew up to be a monster , and the worst father in the history of fathers .
#Text=" Aang says : " But he 's still a human being .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're going to defend him ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I agree with you .
#Text=Fire Lord Ozai is a horrible person , and the world would probably be better off without him , but there 's got to be another way .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Like what ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Maybe we can make some big pots of glue , and then I can use gluebending to stick his arms and legs together so he ca n't bend anymore .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , then you can show him his baby pictures , and all those happy memories will make him good again .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do you really think that would work ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " No !
#Text=" Aang says : " This goes against everything I learned from the monks .
#Text=I ca n't just go around wiping out people I do n't like .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sure you can .
#Text=You 're the Avatar .
#Text=If it 's in the name of keeping balance , I 'm pretty sure the universe will forgive you .
#Text=" Aang says : " This is n't a joke , Sokka !
#Text=None of you understand the position I 'm in .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , we do understand .
#Text=It 's just ... " Aang says : " Just what , Katara ?
#Text=What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're trying to help !
#Text=" Aang says : " Then , when you figure out a way for me to beat the Fire Lord without taking his life , I 'd love to hear it !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , do n't walk away from this .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Let him go .
#Text=He needs time to sort it out by himself .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , Momo .
#Text=I do n't suppose you know what I should do .
#Text=I did n't think so .
#Text="
